Subject: How to update Access Analyzer (Enterprise Auditor) ?
Description:
Hello,


Could you please let us know how to update Access Analyzer (Enterprise Auditor) to version 12.0?
We do not have access to the update file on the community portal.
What_We_Know__c:
------------
11.04.2025 
Artem Naskal 

Customer is unable to download NAA v12.0 because they do not see NAA in "My Products" section of customer portal. 

Customer is asking how they can download needed files for v12.0 and request assistance with upgrade. 

Clarifying how customer can get their hands on upgrade files.
Next_Steps__c: Support will clarify how customer can get NAA v12.0 upgrade files.
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer was planning on upgrading their NAA test environment and asked for instructions. 

Provided these instructions:

If you are upgrading from 11.5 version, then it is recommended first performing an upgrade to 11.6 version, then to 12.0.

Prior to performing an upgrade, please, carefully read the Solution Upgrade Considerations article as upgrade to v12.0 has additional steps that must be performed if you are upgrading from previous version:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AccessAnalyzer_12.0/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Upgrade/SolutionConsiderations.htm

This article has detailed steps of the upgrade procedure for Netwrix Access Analyzer:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AccessAnalyzer_12.0/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Upgrade/Wizard.htm

After upgrading Netwrix Access Analyzer core, the Access Information Center must be upgraded as well. The following article has instructions for the Access Information Center upgrade:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_12.0/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Upgrade.htm
 
After upgrading Core and Access Information Center - perform an upgrade for FSAA Proxy as well. It is recommended using Manual upgrade for the FSAA Proxy module:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AccessAnalyzer_12.0/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/FileSystemProxy/Upgrade.htm

SharePoint Agent module for scanning SharePoint environment must be upgraded as well. This article has instructions for the upgrade procedure for this module:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AccessAnalyzer_12.0/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/SharePointAgent/Upgrade.htm

Customer replied that ticket can be closed as they successfully upgraded after following steps from articles above.
